name: ctMoveDupeRules
description: Use this task to move duplicate detection rules
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: It grabs all published duplicate detection rules and the associated conditions.  It creates them in the target with the same GUIDs.

inputs.name: sourceOrg
inputs.label: Source Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the source organisation where the solution sould be imported

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the target organisation where the solution sould be imported
